title: Get runescape gold for sale from RSorder to Engage in the Invasion of Falador
text: Get runescape gold for sale from RSorder to Engage in the Invasion of Falador , 21 October 2015 -- Get runescape gold from RSorder to Engage in the Invasion of Falador Show off your Pumpkin on RSorder Facebook to Win Free RS GoldTwo weeks of White Knight vs Black Knight action is available in Runescape now. Hurry up to engage in the combat to get unique rewards and enjoy the city's graphical rework. There is no requirement to join in the event, and you will definitely get generous rewards from the event. If you need RS 3 gold to help you gain more from the activity, you can buy rs 2007 gold on RSorder. Join the activity and earn extra XP You can visit Falador and take part in available activities to start the game. You can earn Combat XP by fighting with White Knights, Black Knights or duelling champions. For Construction or Woodcutting XP, you can fight with Sabotage catapults. Besides, you can heal injured soldiers to gain Herblore or Constitution XP. Get RS gold and unique rewards from the activity Apart from the extra XP, players are able to get Falador commendations by performing any of these activities. These stackable units of currency can be converted into supply caches (which yield XP lamps), resource bundles, unique rewards, bobblehead pets and more. You can take Halloween quiz on RSorder Faebook to get free RS gold if you need RS gold when doing these activties. Pick lost research notes to get XP and collecting commendation You'll inevitably pick up some lost research notes which are the first step on a lore-rich miniquest around the city. For the research notes you need to go talk to the following people in this order: Falador Herald - east of the east bankBuy Cheap RS Gold on RSorder to Engage in the Invasion of Falador Sir Renitee - second floor, east side of fally castle Hologram of Lord Daquarius - fally lodestone Sir Amik Varze - third floor, west side of fally castle PoH NPC - east of fally center Aksel in Artisan's Workshop - east of the east bank wyzon the Gardener - northwest side of the garden Falador Mine - straight south of the living rock caverns rope It is quite worthwhile to engage in the activity, so take your time to stock enough RS 3 gold to ensure you can make the most of the activity. RSorder has plenty of cheap RS gold for sale. Apart from the cheap RS 3 gold, you can also get free RS gold by showing off your Pumpkin Lantern on RSorder Facebook. Show off your Pumpkin on RSorder Facebook to Win Free RS Gold Show Pumpkin Lantern to Win Free RS Gold The activity will last from 03:00 a.m. GMT on Oct. 26th, 2015 to 03:00 a.m. GMT Nov. 2nd, 2015. The top player will get 20M RS 3 Gold or 5M RS 07 gold. The second player will get 15M RS 3 Gold or 3M RS 07 gold. The third player will get 10M RS 3 Gold or 2M RS 07 gold.
